headline: 3M Overhaul Resets Portfolio Mix And Offers Potential Valuation Upside
summary: 3M (NYSE:MMM) is rolling out broad business transformation programs that focus on commercial excellence and a higher volume of new product launches. The company plans to reduce its factory and distribution center footprint as part of an efficiency push. Management is also evaluating the potential divestiture of about 10% of the business, signaling a shift in the company’s portfolio mix.
